TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SecureMimeCapability extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: A set of flags that represent the capabilities of an S/MIME client.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.SecureMimeCapability AES128 = int32(128)

Docs.summary: The client supports the AES 128-bit encryption algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.SecureMimeCapability AES192 = int32(256)

Docs.summary: The client supports the AES 192-bit encryption algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.SecureMimeCapability AES256 = int32(512)

Docs.summary: The client supports the AES 256-bit encryption algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.SecureMimeCapability Camellia128 = int32(1024)

Docs.summary: The client supports the Camellia 128-bit encryption algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.SecureMimeCapability Camellia192 = int32(2048)

Docs.summary: The client supports the Camellia 192-bit encryption algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.SecureMimeCapability Camellia256 = int32(4096)

Docs.summary: The client supports the Camellia 256-bit encryption algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.SecureMimeCapability Cast5 = int32(32)

Docs.summary: The client supports the Cast-5 128-bit encryption algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.SecureMimeCapability DES = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The client supports the DES encryption algorithm.
Docs.remarks: This is extremely weak encryption and should not be used without consent from the user.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.SecureMimeCapability Idea = int32(64)

Docs.summary: The client supports the IDEA 128-bit encryption algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.SecureMimeCapability RC2128 = int32(4)

Docs.summary: The client supports the RC2 128-bit encryption algorithm.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.SecureMimeCapability RC240 = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The client supports the RC2 40-bit encryption algorithm.
Docs.remarks: This is extremely weak encryption and should not be used without consent from the user.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.SecureMimeCapability RC264 = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The client supports the RC2 64-bit encryption algorithm.
Docs.remarks: This is very weak encryption and should not be used without consent from the user.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.SecureMimeCapability TripleDES = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The client supports the Triple-DES encryption algorithm.
Docs.remarks: This is the weakest recommended encryption algorithm for use starting with S/MIME v3 and should only be used as a fallback if it is unknown what encryption algorithms are supported by the recipient's mail client.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype MimeKit.Cryptography.SecureMimeCapability Unknown = int32(0)
